channel.title: CPTSD & Asperger's Healing - Audio Series
channel.description:
A healing journey through complex trauma and Asperger's syndrome. This series explores somatic keys to healing, unlocking self-healing with agency, and rewiring trauma to reclaim your integrated self.
These audio sessions provide guidance for those navigating the intersection of CPTSD and Asperger's, offering practical approaches to healing and integration.
channel.author: CPTSD & Asperger's Healing Series
channel.itunes:author: CPTSD & Asperger's Healing Series
channel.itunes:summary: A healing journey through complex trauma and Asperger's syndrome. This series explores somatic keys to healing, unlocking self-healing with agency, and rewiring trauma to reclaim your integrated self.

item.title: Chapter 01 - Unlocking Self-Healing with Agency and a Spiral Ascent
item.description: The first chapter in our healing journey explores how to unlock self-healing through developing agency and understanding the spiral ascent model of recovery. This foundational session sets the stage for deeper healing work.
item.dc:creator: CPTSD & Asperger's Healing Series
item.itunes:summary: The first chapter in our healing journey explores how to unlock self-healing through developing agency and understanding the spiral ascent model of recovery. This foundational session sets the stage for deeper healing work.

item.title: Chapter 02 - Unpacking Somatic Keys to Healing Complex Trauma and Asperger's
item.description: In this second chapter, we dive deep into the somatic keys that unlock healing for both complex trauma and Asperger's syndrome. Learn practical approaches to body-based healing and integration.
item.dc:creator: CPTSD & Asperger's Healing Series
item.itunes:summary: In this second chapter, we dive deep into the somatic keys that unlock healing for both complex trauma and Asperger's syndrome. Learn practical approaches to body-based healing and integration.

item.title: Chapter 03 - Rewiring Trauma and Reclaiming Your Integrated Self
item.description: The third chapter focuses on the process of rewiring trauma patterns and reclaiming your integrated self. This session builds upon the previous chapters to help you create lasting change and integration.
item.dc:creator: CPTSD & Asperger's Healing Series
item.itunes:summary: The third chapter focuses on the process of rewiring trauma patterns and reclaiming your integrated self. This session builds upon the previous chapters to help you create lasting change and integration.
